name: Super Crate Hoarder
description:
:

Made in < 48 hrs for Ludum Dare 42. A clone of `Super Crate Box` with the addition you never dispose of your crates. That means each crate you pick up sticks around and becomes a platform.

* Collect crates to gain points!
* Enemies who fall through the bottom come back through the top and move faster!
* Each crate gives you a random weapon!
* Crates, once collected, stick around as items to platform around!

Tools:
* Monogame - Framework
* Nez- Engine
* BFXR- SFX
* PyxelEdit- Pixel Art
